Caption: Prof. K.A.V. Pandalai (Director) addresses the audience during the inauguration of Computer Centre. On the dais from the left; Prof. S. Sampath, Prof. A. Ramachandran, Dr. Erhard Eppler (Minister of Cooperation, Federal Republic of Germany), Prof. K.T. Chandy (Chairman, Board of Governors)
Event: Special Convocation, Inauguration of Computer Centre
